creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: hen and rooster walking toward LL, hen in front of rooster; rooster looking down at two small chicks at PL side of hen; another small chick to LR of hen; hen is looking out to L, past scroll edge
title: Roosters, Hen, and Chicks
